SMW Subobject for (1)High Alchemy value: 72Buy limit: 2000Examine: 1 dose of super restore potion.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Super restoreImage: File:Super restore(1).pngUses infobox: ItemWeight: 0.020Value: 120Version anchor: 1 doseRelease date: 27 July 2004Item ID: 3030

A super restore is a potion that restores all player stats that have been lowered, including Prayer, but not including Hitpoints. Players with level 63 Herblore can make a super restore potion by mixing a snapdragon in a vial of water and then adding red spiders' eggs, giving 142.5 experience. Super restores can further be made into Sanfew serums by adding (in order) unicorn horn dust, snake weed, and nail beast nails into a super restore potion.

The restore value obtained per dose is 8 + 25% of the player's base level (round down) in each of the affected skills. For example, a player with 84 Thieving and 63 Smithing would restore both 29 points of Thieving and 23 points of Smithing for each dose consumed. The maximum amount of points that can be restored with this potion is 32 at level 96. This means that a super restore potion will restore 1 more Prayer point per dose than a prayer potion.

If a Prayer cape or ring of the gods (i) is equipped or a Prayer cape or holy wrench is in the player's inventory, the prayer restore increases to 8 + 27% of the player's current Prayer level, rounded down. This does not affect the rate of restoration of stats other than Prayer.

Two 3-dose super restores can be obtained by starting the Zogre Flesh Eaters quest.

Contents

  • 2 Creation

Effects[edit | edit source]

Stat restore is calculated with: ⌊ L e v e l × 1 4 ⌋ + 8 {\displaystyle \lfloor Level\times {\frac {1}{4}}\rfloor +8}

Level Boost Level Boost Level Boost
1-3 +8 36-39 +17 72-75 +26
4-7 +9 40-43 +18 76-79 +27
8-11 +10 44-47 +19 80-83 +28
12-15 +11 48-51 +20 84-87 +29
16-19 +12 52-55 +21 88-91 +30
20-23 +13 56-59 +22 92-95 +31
24-27 +14 60-63 +23 96-99 +32
28-31 +15 64-67 +24
32-35 +16 68-71 +25

If a ring of the gods (i) or Prayer cape is equipped, or alternatively if a Prayer cape or holy wrench is in the player's inventory, the amount of restored Prayer points is calculated with: ⌊ P r a y e r L e v e l × 27 100 ⌋ + 8 {\displaystyle \lfloor PrayerLevel\times {\frac {27}{100}}\rfloor +8}

Level Boost Level Boost Level Boost
1-3 +8 34-37 +17 67-70 +26
4-7 +9 38-40 +18 71-74 +27
8-11 +10 41-44 +19 75-77 +28
12-14 +11 45-48 +20 78-81 +29
15-18 +12 49-51 +21 82-85 +30
19-22 +13 52-55 +22 86-88 +31
23-25 +14 56-59 +23 89-92 +32
26-29 +15 60-62 +24 93-96 +33
30-33 +16 63-66 +25 97-99 +34

A '''super restore''' is a potion that restores all player [[stats]] that have been lowered, including [[Prayer]], but not including [[Hitpoints]]. Players with level 63 [[Herblore]] can make a super restore potion by mixing a [[snapdragon]] in a [[vial of water]] and then adding [[red spiders' eggs]], giving 142.5 [[experience]]. Super restores can further be made into [[Sanfew serum]]s by adding (in order) [[unicorn horn dust]], [[snake weed]], and [[nail beast nails]] into a super restore potion.

The restore value obtained per dose is 8 + 25% of the player's base level (round down) in each of the affected [[skills]]. For example, a player with 84 [[Thieving]] and 63 [[Smithing]] would restore both 29 points of Thieving and 23 points of Smithing for each dose consumed. The maximum amount of points that can be restored with this potion is 32 at level 96. This means that a super restore potion will restore 1 more Prayer point per dose than a [[prayer potion]].

If a [[Prayer cape]] or [[ring of the gods (i)]] is equipped or a Prayer cape or [[holy wrench]] is in the player's inventory, the ''prayer'' restore increases to 8 + 27% of the player's current Prayer level, rounded down. This does not affect the rate of restoration of stats other than Prayer.

Two 3-dose super restores can be obtained by starting the [[Zogre Flesh Eaters]] [[quest]].
